entities.name: don't write architecture docs without validating integrations

entities.name: check GPIO pin conflicts when stacking Pi HATs
entities.context: ReSpeaker 2-Mic HAT and e-ink HAT both use GPIO 17. USB peripherals avoid conflicts entirely.

entities.name: know when to punt to human action
entities.context: Email/account creation has anti-bot moats. A 2-minute phone call would solve it.
